title: Once Upon a Time in Saengchori
overview: This drama revolves around a group of brokerage firm employees who are relocated to a quiet rural village, where both thrilling and bizarre events occur and romance bloom between the employees and residents. At the center of the many secrets surrounding Saengchori is a complicated murder mystery in which the employees find themselves unwittingly involved. However, there are some that prefer certain skeletons in the closet remain hidden, and will go to any lengths for this. Is the murderer someone from the quirky, country village of Saengchori, or could it be one of their own?
